name: Play de Oboeru: Eitango Deruderu 1700
overview: Play de Oboeru Eitango Deruderu 1700 is an educational game in which the players can learn the meaning of some english words in japanese language. The gameplay is about choosing a golf player and make it compete alone or againts a computer player or a human player in a round of golf, but in this game the player won't play golf, in this game the player have to select the proper japanese word for the english one that the game asked, there are 20 words for each golf hole. Each time that the player fails the word a stroke is added to his count (the max is 19 strokes) so is better not fail to win each hole. The player can pass some words (but there is a limit of the times that the player can pass the words). There are different difficulty levels (from easier to hardest one: each of them with a different character as the player opponent), an alone mode to practice learning those japanese words and even a vs mode for 2 human players to compete.
